name: Family Law Express News
author: FamilyLawExpress.com.au

sections.description:
This plugin was designed for family law bloggers who want to add headline news to their website. Headline categories include family law news, expert family law briefs, recent court and tribunal decisions, sample legal documents, family law factsheets, family law software and other resources, and much more information as delivered by the Family Law Express website. View a sample of this plugin in action in the right sidebar at [Wordpress] (http://www.familylawexpress.com.au)

Features:

  • Add Fresh Family Law Headlines: This WordPress plugin will display a mix of new Australian family law news headlines on your own blog.

  • This plugin is “White Label”. The design is determined by your WordPress theme and no other logos or branding will be displayed or marketed to the end user.

  • Customised Australian Family Law News: You customise what types of newly published family law news or information is displayed to your readers in the easy to use admin screen.

  • Adjustable Content Display: Ability to add a character limited summary option to display excerpts from stories directly on your blog.

  • Continuous RSS Scrolling: Headlines will vertically scroll at a speed you determine, allowing a large amount of content to be displayed in a small box.

  • Easy Installation: No coding knowledge required to configure this plugin. Just activate the plugin and drag and drop the widget to sidebar and check the front end.

  • Scalable Performance: Based on the latest WordPress feed fetching technology for enhanced performance and scalability

  • Multiple Flavors of RSS Supported: Supports all major types of RSS and Atom feeds including: RSS 0.91 (Netscape), RSS 0.91 (Userland), RSS 0.90, RSS 0.92, RSS 1.0, RSS 2.0, Atom 0.3, Atom 1.0

  • Easy Configuration: Easy to use configuration settings screen

  • Configurable name for headline box: Call this widget box whatever you want (ie. Divorce News, Child Custody News, Family Law News, etc.)

View a sample of this plugin in action in the right sidebar at [Wordpress] (http://www.familylawexpress.com.au)
Copyright 2014 by FamilyLawExpress

This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA
sections.installation:
To install this WordPress plugin, please follow these steps:

  1. Download the zipped plugin file to your local machine.
  2. Unzip the file called “family-law-express-news.zip”
  3. Upload the “family-law-express-headlines” folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  5. Configure the defaults on the options menu screen.
  6. Drag the “Family Law Express Headlines” widget to your sidebar in the Appearance section
sections.faq:
I installed the plugin but I don’t see it on my site!

After installing, you have to add it to a sidebar under Appearance > Widgets.

short_description: Do you run an Australian family law related blog? This plugin will automatically publish up-to-date news or events directly onto your family law blog.
